DocumentTranslateContent.allowFallback.name: allowFallback
DocumentTranslateContent.allowFallback.description:
Specifies that the service is allowed to fall back to a general system when a custom system doesn't exist. 
    Possible values are: true (default) or false.

DocumentTranslateContent.category.name: category
DocumentTranslateContent.category.description:
A string specifying the category (domain) of the translation. This parameter is used to get translations 
    from a customized system built with Custom Translator. Add the Category ID from your Custom Translator 
    project details to this parameter to use your deployed customized system. Default value is: general.

DocumentTranslateContent.document.name: document
DocumentTranslateContent.document.description: Document to be translated in the form

DocumentTranslateContent.glossary.name: glossary
DocumentTranslateContent.glossary.description: Glossary / translation memory will be used during translation in the form.

DocumentTranslateContent.sourceLanguage.name: sourceLanguage
DocumentTranslateContent.sourceLanguage.description:
Specifies source language of the input document.
If this parameter isn't specified, automatic language detection is applied to determine the source language.
For example if the source document is written in English, then use sourceLanguage=en

DocumentTranslateContent.targetLanguage.name: targetLanguage
DocumentTranslateContent.targetLanguage.description:
Specifies the language of the output document.
The target language must be one of the supported languages included in the translation scope.
For example if you want to translate the document in German language, then use targetLanguage=de
